description: In this lab, advanced learners will dive into Python's advanced concepts.
topics: Working with advanced data structures (sets, dictionaries)
generated_text:
**Module 29: Python**
**Duration: 68 minutes**
**Level: Advanced**

In this lab, advanced learners will dive into Python's advanced concepts. You will practice:

* Implementing decorators and generators
* Using lambda functions and map/reduce
* Working with advanced data structures (sets, dictionaries)

Through hands-on exercises, you will apply these concepts to real-world problems. By the end of this module, you will be able to write efficient, Pythonic code and optimize existing programs. Bring your laptop and get ready to code!
